short_description: FAST ACTING: Efferdent retainer cleaner tablets kill 99.99% of odor-causing bacteria in just 3 minutes
EFFECTIVE: These retainer cleaner tablets use powerful oxi-action to dissolve tough stains, remove discoloration, reduce plaque buildup, and remove food particles

product_description: Efferdent Retainer Clean & Bright retainer cleaner tablets kill 99.99% of odor-causing bacteria. Gentle and non-abrasive, these antibacterial cleaning tablets are safe for daily use on retainers, aligners, mouth guards, night guards, dentures, and other dental appliances. These retainer cleaner tablets work in just 3 minutes to remove tough stains and discoloration. To use, drop one tablet into a glass of warm water or denture bath, submerge the dental appliance and keep for 3 minutes, then rinse off and it's ready to go. Efferdent is the first brand accepted by the American Dental Association to make denture cleaning tablets and retainer cleaning tablets. This great value package includes 120 individually wrapped tablets (4 month supply). Efferdent available in different variants Complete Clean, Minty Fresh & Clean, Deep Clean and Retainer Clean & Bright. Your purchase may be eligible for FSA/HSA; check your health plan for details.

name: Stain-Away Plus Dental Cleanser, 8.1-Ounce (Pack of 3)
short_description: Ultimate Cleaning Power: Stain Away Plus Denture Cleanser boasts a fast-acting, powerful effervescent powder that provides three times more cleaning power than traditional tablets. With 80 cleanings per 8.1 oz bottle, this solution ensures your dentures stay immaculately clean and fresh.

Quick & Effective Results: Experience the convenience of a 5-minute cleaning routine with Stain Away Plus Denture Cleanser. Its fast action means you can enjoy a professional-level clean every time, leaving your dentures whiter and brighter, just like new.

Plaque Prevention & Odor Elimination: Daily use of Stain Away Plus Denture Cleanser prevents plaque build-up, promoting optimal oral health. Additionally, the formulation is designed to kill odor-causing contaminants, ensuring your dentures stay fresh throughout the day.

Night-Long Performance: This denture cleanser doesn't stop working after 5 minutes. It continues its action all night long, providing a deep and thorough cleaning experience that goes beyond what you'd expect from a traditional denture cleaner.

Easy-to-Use & Satisfaction Guaranteed: Achieve optimal results with ease by following simple usage instructions. For daily use, mix 1/2 to 1 capful of powder in hot tap water, soak dentures, and rinse thoroughly. For heavy stains, a more concentrated solution can be used for overnight soaking. Stain Away Plus Denture Cleanser is recommended for full dentures, and satisfaction is guaranteed, making it a reliable choice for your denture cleaning needs.
product_description: Stain Away Plus Denture Cleanser 8.1 oz bottle - Stain Away Plus Denture Cleanser: 80 Cleanings. Fast Action- Cleans in 5 minutes. Whitens and brightens dentures like new. Daily use prevents plaque build-up. Kills odor causing contaminants. Works all night long to give you a professional cleaning every time. 3x more powerful than tablets: Fast-acting, powerful effervescent powder. Recommended for full dentures only. Use daily to prevent plaque build-up. Satisfaction guaranteed. How To Use: For daily use, mix 1/2 to 1 capful of powder in 1/2 cup of hot tap water. Soak dentures. Rinse thoroughly. For heavy stains, mix 2-3 capfuls in 1/2 cup of hot tap water. Soak for 20-30 minutes or overnight as needed. Rinse. Warnings: Keep in a cool, dry place out of reach of children. Do not use it in your mouth.
